original_title: The Secret History of the Moon
overview: This short film takes you back 4.5 billion years to witness the dramatic ways which the moon could have formed, according to the latest mind-blowing theories. By reading the clues written in Moon rocks, we are closer than ever to knowing its full story. But the Moon still holds its secrets close.
tagline: What else is the Moon hiding?
title: The Secret History of the Moon
